item.title: Adding Favicons
item.description: Nothing makes a personal website seem polished like a clean, minimalistic favicon. This article quickly lists the steps to add a favicon to a Hugo website like this one. Create a favicon in an art package like Illustrator or Inkscape. Upload your image to Real Favicon Generator Extract the favicon package it creates to the /static/ directory which lives in the root of your HUGO site. Copy the given html and add it to your /layouts/partials/head.
